      public Map<String,Object> getTextWithAnnotation(String id) throws com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
      Get a map of annotated speech texts which is already in sentences split
      Parameters:
      id - : speech id
      Returns:
      Map<String, Object>: a tree structure of data e.g.{speechID=[{text = ..., sentiment = ..., pos = {"Sehr" = "ADV",...}, entity = {"Herren!" = "ORG",...}},...]}

      com.fasterxml.jackson.core.JsonProcessingException
